transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .icon-text{display:block;font-size:12px;font-weight:300;overflow:hidden;width:60px!important}.icon-photos,.icon-text{color:#000;text-overflow:ellipsis}.icon-photos{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin:1rem;text-align:center;width:60px}.icon-photos:hover{cursor:pointer}.icon-photos:focus .icon-image-photos{filter:grayscale(100%) brightness(30%) sepia(100%) hue-rotate(-180deg) saturate(400%) contrast(.9)}.icon-photos:focus .icon-text{background:#000076;color:#fff;margin:0}.icon-photos:focus .border-box{border:1px dotted #000}.icon-image-photos{height:30px;margin-bottom:5px;width:30px}.grid-container-photos{display:flex;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:wrap;height:0!important}.file-explorer{background:#fff;border-color:#000 #fafafa #fafafa #000;border-style:solid;border-width:1.5px;box-shadow:none;height:calc(100% - 54px);margin:2px;overflow-y:auto;padding:2px;width:auto;z-index:10}.minimize{display:none}.window{box-sizing:border-box;display:flex;flex-flow:column;margin:0;padding:0;touch-action:none;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;user-select:none}.fullscreen{height:var(--fullscreen)!important;margin:0;padding:0;transition:all .5s ease;width:100%!important}.content{flex-grow:1;overflow-x:hidden;padding:var(--content-padding-top) var(--content-padding-right) var(--content-padding-bottom) var(--content-padding-left)}.bottom-bar{display:flex;height:22px;width:100%}.bar{border-color:#000 #fafafa #fafafa #000;border-style:solid;border-width:1.5px;box-shadow:none;height:100%;margin:2px;padding:0 2px 1px 0}.left-bar,.right-bar{align-items:center;display:flex;justify-content:flex-start;padding-left:2px;width:100%}.top-bar{background:#00007c}.top-bar-nav{display:flex;height:22px;width:100%}.top-bar-text{height:100%;justify-content:flex-start;padding-left:12px}.top-bar-text,.top-bar-window{align-items:center;display:flex}.top-bar-window{flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;margin:2px;padding:2px;width:auto;z-index:10}.top-bar-deactivated{background:#7b7d7b}.top-bar:hover{cursor:default}.window-name{align-items:center;color:#fff;display:flex;font-size:16px;font-weight:500;margin:0 0 0 3px;padding:0}.icon-image{height:15px;margin-bottom:0;margin-right:5px;margin-top:0;width:15px}
